Module iu.util.jdbc.pool
Package edu.iu.jdbc.pool

Class IuConnectionPoolDataSource

java.lang.Object
edu.iu.jdbc.pool.IuCommonDataSource
edu.iu.jdbc.pool.IuConnectionPoolDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, EventListener, CommonDataSource, ConnectionEventListener, ConnectionPoolDataSource
public class IuConnectionPoolDataSource extends IuCommonDataSource implements ConnectionPoolDataSource
Non-transactional connection pooling data source.

    IuConnectionPoolDataSource(UnsafeSupplier<PooledConnection> factory)
    Creates a new connection pool backed by an externally initialized connection factory.
